con:testCase.name: GoodCase-DEV-BankTransfer-Pain001
con:testCase.con:description:
Tests implementation from us: https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-2432 https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-2498 https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-2499 https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-2607
NOTE!
This logik is implemented only for old bank-transfer via GUI: Bankdaten prozessieren File format for CAMT054 file is: 2019-09-11_C54_DE73700202700005716977_EUR_000510.xml mft-directory on sftp-server are: bt_camt054 and bt_pain001 Only jobs for bt must be executed List with allowed ibans for tenant is in settings: com.o2.directrecharge.core.settings.FinanceDepartmentSettingKey.BT_IBAN_LIST Downloaded files must be unvisible on GUI
Prerequisites:
Create camt054 file and move to new mft-directory. Camt054 files with ibans. Expected: One pain001 file for each iban in camt054 file.
Test-Scenarios:
Camt054 file with first iban. Camt054 file with second iban. Camt054 file with unknown iban. Camt054 file with technical or functional file inside. --> Expected: Error state.
Implementation requirements:
Banktransfer classic, CAMT054 Files are retrieved from MFT, new Dir in existig DD MFT available
only 2 IBAN are supported, if other IBAN is used, the file can not be processed 2 IBANS should be configured as settings retrieves files are parsed and TX stored in CAMT054 table, it must be possible to separate DD credits from banktransfer credits new Job for processing the Banktransfer credits is required, similiar logoc as existing (reuse of controller, manager, DB-Banktransfer Topups) if a banktrasfer could not be processed: mark in CAMT table, so that a PAIN001 File could be created there is one PAIN001 File per IBAN and per day, processed in the evening PIAN001 files are transfered to the same MFT dir as existing PAIN008/001 files for DD Report (Begleitzettel for PAIN001 required (for each IBAN) additionally to existing DD Reports, send to TEF Finance Department Processing Report for CAMT054 files (klassicher Banktransfer) additionally to existing DD Reports, send to TEF Finance Department

con:config.con:query: SELECT COUNT(FILE_ID) as iCount, MAX(FILE_ID) as maxID FROM FILEUPLOAD_INFO

SELECT FILEUPLOAD_INFO.FILE_NAME, FILEUPLOAD_DATA.FILE_CONTENT FROM FILEUPLOAD_INFO LEFT JOIN FILEUPLOAD_DATA ON FILEUPLOAD_INFO.FILE_ID = FILEUPLOAD_DATA.FILE_ID WHERE FILEUPLOAD_INFO.FILE_ID > '${#TestCase#maxID}' AND FILEUPLOAD_INFO.FILE_TYPE = 'pain.001.001.03' ORDER BY FILEUPLOAD_DATA.FILE_ID DESC

con:configuration.path: contains (//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/FILE_CONTENT[1]/text(), 'IBAN>${#TestCase#IBAN-2}') and contains (//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/FILE_CONTENT[1]/text(), '${#TestCase#Amount}</InstdAmt>') and contains (//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/FILE_CONTENT[1]/text(), '<CtrlSum>10.00') and contains (//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/FILE_CONTENT[1]/text(), '<Ustrd>${#TestCase#MSISDN-Unknown}') and contains (//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/FILE_CONTENT[1]/text(), '<Ustrd>${#TestCase#MSISDN-Wrong}')

contains (//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[2]/FILE_CONTENT[1]/text(), 'IBAN>${#TestCase#IBAN-1}') and contains (//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[2]/FILE_CONTENT[1]/text(), '${#TestCase#Amount}</InstdAmt>') and contains (//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[2]/FILE_CONTENT[1]/text(), '<CtrlSum>10.00') and contains (//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[2]/FILE_CONTENT[1]/text(), '<Ustrd>${#TestCase#MSISDN-Unknown}') and contains (//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[2]/FILE_CONTENT[1]/text(), '<Ustrd>${#TestCase#MSISDN-Wrong}')

con:config.con:query: SELECT FILEUPLOAD_INFO.FILE_NAME, FILEUPLOAD_DATA.FILE_CONTENT FROM FILEUPLOAD_INFO LEFT JOIN FILEUPLOAD_DATA ON FILEUPLOAD_INFO.FILE_ID = FILEUPLOAD_DATA.FILE_ID WHERE FILEUPLOAD_INFO.FILE_ID > '${#TestCase#maxID}' AND FILEUPLOAD_INFO.FILE_TYPE = 'CSV' ORDER BY FILEUPLOAD_DATA.FILE_ID DESC
